Skills : Python software developer,Python,developer,python developer,Software engineer,Software,Engineer,Automation,Automative engineer

Description

Position Details:

Job Title - Software Engineer I

Location - Holtsville, NY

Duration - 4+ Months (Possible Extension)

Description
  • The tasking involves setting up and programming a Universal Robotic (UR) arm and gripper to pick up grocery items and move them across the plane of a scanner as performed by a human checker.
  • The UR robot and table are large so this tasking would be in the Holtsville Facility.
  • For safety and security reasons, this tasking can't be fully performed remotely and the candidate would need to be in office.
  • The sample set of test items is large.
  • Some training is involved, but the candidate must have some experience with robots and robotic control so the training is limited.
Required Skills
  • Develops and implements software systems or applications through the use of software best practices such as Specification, Design, Coding, Testing, Documentation, and Maintenance.
  • Knowledge of Development Environments, Configuration Management Tools, and Operating systems is expected.
  • Bachelor's degree in an appropriate engineering discipline required.
  • Minimum of 0-2 years of engineering experience.
  • Some experience in Python/Script programming and Robots.
